briefTitle: MK0954 Versus Placebo for Treatment of Mild to Moderate Hypertension

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patient has been diagnosed with mild to moderate hypertension
* Patient has no treatment or active medical problem, other than hypertension that might affect the patients blood pressure

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnant of lactating female patients
* Secondary hypertension or history of malignant hypertension
* Sitting systolic blood pressure \> 210 mmHg
* History of stroke
* History of myocardial infarction with in the past year
* Current of prior history of heart failure
* Known hypersensitivity to losartan
* Obesity
* Patients known to be HIV positive or known to be positive for Hepatitis B
* Absence of one kidney
* Patient is abusing or previously abused alcohol or drugs with in past two years

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change From Baseline in Trough Sitting Diastolic Blood Pressure (SiDBP) at Week 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean change from baseline in trough (24 hours after the last morning dose and 12 hours after the last PM dose) SiDBP at Week 12

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change From Baseline in Trough Sitting Systolic Blood Pressure (SiSBP) as Week 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean change from baseline in trough (24 hours after the last morning dose and 12 hours after the last PM dose) SiSBP at Week 12

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change From Baseline in Peak Sitting Diastolic Blood Pressure (SiDBP) at Week 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean change from baseline in peak (6 hours after the last morning dose) SiDBP at Week 12

outcomeMeasures.title: Categories of Antihypertensive Response in Trough Sitting Diastolic Blood Pressure (SiDBP) at Week 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Patients with trough SiDBP \<90 mm Hg were in Category I, ≥90 but decreased at least 10 mm Hg were in Category II, and ≥90 and decreased less than 10 mm Hg or increased were in Category III.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients With Clinical Adverse Experiences (CAEs)
outcomeMeasures.description: An adverse experience (AE) is defined as any unfavorable and unintended change in the structure, function, or chemistry of the body temporally associated with the use of the SPONSOR'S product, whether or not considered related to the use of the product

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients With Serious CAEs
outcomeMeasures.description: Serious CAEs are any AEs occurring at any dose that; Results in death; or Is life threatening; or Results in a persistent or significant disability/incapacity; or Results in or prolongs an existing inpatient; or Is a congenital anomaly/birth defect; or Is a cancer; or Is an overdose

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients With Drug-related CAEs
outcomeMeasures.description: Patients with drug-related (as assessed by an investigator who is a qualified physician according to his/her best clinical judgment) CAEs during the 12-week treatment period

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients Discontinued Due to CAEs
outcomeMeasures.description: Patients discontinued due to CAEs during the 12-week treatment period

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients Who Died
outcomeMeasures.description: Patients who died during the 12-week treatment period

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients With Laboratory Adverse Experiences (LAEs)
outcomeMeasures.description: A laboratory adverse experience (LAE) is defined as any unfavorable and unintended change in the chemistry of the body temporally associated with the use of the SPONSOR'S product, whether or not considered related to the use of the product

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients With Serious LAEs
outcomeMeasures.description: Serious LAEs are any LAEs occurring at any dose that; Results in death; or Is life threatening; or Results in a persistent or significant disability/incapacity; or Results in or prolongs an existing inpatient; or Is a congenital anomaly/birth defect; or Is a cancer; or Is an overdose

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients With Drug-related LAEs
outcomeMeasures.description: Patients with drug-related LAEs during the 12-week treatment period

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients Discontinued Due to LAEs
outcomeMeasures.description: Patients discontinued due to LAEs during the 12-week treatment period
